Name: Armored Core
Effect: Shield 10 . Give Shield items to the right of this + 5 Shield for the fight.
Passive: When you use any item to the left of this, Charge this 1 second.

Name: Claw Arm
Passive: When this gains Haste , give this and the Weapon to the right + 5 Damage for this fight.

Name: Cog
Effect: Haste an adjacent item for 1 seconds.

Name: Companion Core
Passive: When you use another Friend, Charge this 1 second.

Name: Critical Core
Passive: This and items to the right of this have + 15 Crit Chance . When you use any item on the left, Charge this 1 second. When you Crit with any item, Charge this 1 second.

Name: Flamethrower
Effect: Deal 25 Damage . Burn equal to 200/300% of this item's Damage .

Name: Heavy Combat Armor
Effect: Deal 25 Damage . Shield 53 . Slow 3 other items for 2 seconds.
Passive: When you use any item to the left of this, give this + 50 Damage for the fight. When you use any item to the right of this, give this + 50 Shield for the fight.

Name: Plasma Grenade
Effect: Burn BOTH players 5 . Slow enemy items for 4 seconds.

Name: Thermal Lance
Passive: When this gains Haste , give this +1 Burn for this fight.

Name: Thrusters
Effect: Gain 2 Speed for this fight Burn 2
